metadata.title: CTRL + ALT + PREBUNK
metadata.description: IFRC Solferino Academy - Fact-checking and media literacy platform

chat.illustrationAlt: Network of people and social media connections

step1.greeting: Hey! Welcome to the feed. I'm Paula, and I'll help you navigate this wild world of online information. ðŸ‘‹
step1.option3: Just show me how it works!ðŸŽ®

step2.explanation: Don't worry - you've got this! See that post below? Someone's sharing something about climate change. Your job: decide if it's trustworthy or total nonsense.
step2.option1: I can spot fake news already!
step2.option2: Got it! Like the good stuff, call out the fake stuff.
step2.option3: Wait, how do I know what's real?

step3.tips: Exactly! Here's the secret: Look for exaggerated language, missing sources, and stuff that seems TOO crazy to be true. Try the first post - I'll tell you how you did!

example.message: Here's an example post with explanations. Notice the exaggerated language and missing sources - these are red flags!

completed.message: Game begins! You're all set to navigate the feed and identify misinformation. Good luck! ðŸŽ®
